hero.name: Vasilii Molchanov
hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: With 3 years of experience building web applications and services

about.title: About Me
about.languages: Languages: Russian: C2, English: B2-C1:, Montenegrin-Serbian: B1-B2
about.description: I am a 20-year-old Full Stack Developer based in Montenegro with 3 years of experience in building web applications and services. I am multilingual, fluent in Russian (C2), English (B2-C1), and Montenegrin-Serbian (B1-B2). My technical expertise spans across frontend development with React, Vue, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS; backend development with Node.js, Flask, PHP, MySQL, and PostgreSQL; and various tools including Git (GitHub-GitLab), Docker, Vite, and Supabase. I have worked on diverse projects including e-commerce platforms, social media dashboards, and mobile banking applications. I am passionate about creating efficient, user-friendly web solutions and continuously expanding my knowledge in the field of web development.

lifeOutside.title: Life Outside of Work
lifeOutside.subtitle: When I'm not coding, I enjoy...
lifeOutside.hobbiesDescription: In my free time, I enjoy exploring various activities that help me relax and stay creative.
lifeOutside.catsDescription: Meet my furry companions who keep me company during long coding sessions.
